pages.text: $(li)Gazelles are passive creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savannas$(/l).$(br)$(li)If just one Gazelle is attacked, the whole herd flees.$(br)$(li)Gazelles are very fast, so you will not be able to catch it easily.$(br)$(li)Gazelles may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/gazelle_horn)Gazelle Horn$(/l) upon death.
You can use an $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/echolocator)Echolocator$(/l) to attract these creatures.
